title: Shahjahan Miah
text:
Shahjahan Miah (Birth: 10 January 1947) is a <a href="Bangladesh%20Nationalist%20Party">Bangladesh Nationalist Party</a> politician. He was elected a member of parliament from Undivided <a href="Rajshahi-1">Rajshahi-1</a> in <a href="1979%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">1979</a> and from <a href="Chapai%20Nawabganj-1">Chapai Nawabganj-1</a> in <a href="1991%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">1991</a>, <a href="February%201996%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">15 February 1996</a>, <a href="June%201996%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">12 June 1996</a> and <a href="2001%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">2001</a> Bangladeshi general election. He was the organizer of the <a href="Bangladesh%20Liberation%20War">Liberation War of Bangladesh</a>.
Early life.
Shahjahan Miah was born in 10 January 1947in <a href="Shibganj%20Upazila%2C%20Chapai%20Nawabganj">Shibganj Upazila</a> of <a href="Chapai%20Nawabganj%20District">Chapai Nawabganj District</a>. His father is Faiz Ahmed Mia and mother Naibor Nessa. He received his bachelor's and master's degree in economics from <a href="University%20of%20Rajshahi">University of Rajshahi</a>.
Career.
Shahjahan Miah is the president of Chapai Nawabganj district BNP. He was elected to parliament from Undivided <a href="Rajshahi-1">Rajshahi-1</a> a <a href="Bangladesh%20Nationalist%20Party">Bangladesh Nationalist Party</a> candidate in <a href="1979%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">1979 Bangladeshi general election</a>. He was elected a member of parliament for <a href="Chapai%20Nawabganj-1">Chapai Nawabganj-1</a> as a <a href="Bangladesh%20Nationalist%20Party">Bangladesh Nationalist Party</a> candidate in <a href="1991%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">1991</a>, <a href="February%201996%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">15 February 1996</a>, <a href="June%201996%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">12 June 1996</a> and <a href="2001%20Bangladeshi%20general%20election">2001</a> Bangladeshi general election.
